entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
